thread.title: 19 Things You'll Only Know If You've Ever Whipped Your Boob Out To Feed A Baby
thread.title_full: 19 Things You'll Only Know If You've Ever Whipped Your Boob Out To Feed A Baby

author: Krista Torres
title: 19 Things You'll Only Know If You've Ever Whipped Your Boob Out To Feed A Baby
text:
View this image ›
imgur.com ID: 10380810 2. Literally having raw nipples. View this image ›
the laotiancommotion.com They might be so bad it looks like you’re producing strawberry milk.
ID: 10380113 3. Leaking all day e’ry day. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10380130 4. And panicking when you leak through your breast pads, through your bra, and onto your shirt. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10380144 5. Having unquenchable thirst. View this image ›
Nickelodeon ID: 10380448 6. And also having the biggest appetite ever. View this image ›
New Line Cinema ID: 10380459 7. Being really, really, REALLY upset if your hard-earned milk accidentally spills. View this image ›
someecards ID: 10380183 8. And nearing tears if your baby projectile vomits your milk up. View this image ›
Torres / Via BuzzFeed ID: 10380194 9. Knowing that pumping in a bathroom stall is THE WORST. View this image ›
Paramount It’s right up there with eating in a bathroom stall.
ID: 10380248 10. Feeling like your boobs are going to explode if you go too long without pumping or breastfeeding. View this image ›
Disney ID: 10380365 11. Carrying nipple cream everywhere with you. View this image ›
MTV ID: 10380659 12. Understanding the ironic misfortune of producing more milk than usual when you have to pump n’ dump. View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10380320 13. Just being flat out annoyed when anyone glares at you while breastfeeding in public. View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10380716 14. Trying to figure out how to work weird nursing bras. View this image ›
ID: 10380543 15. Feeling literally like a cow when you pump yourself. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10380788 16. Tasting or trying to get someone else to taste your breastmilk. View this image ›
Starz ID: 10381867 17. Finding out that getting in a warm shower creates another whole shower. View this image ›
reggiemental404 / Via instagram.com ID: 10380802 18. Having to cover your boobs in warm towels and massage them to clear a clogged milk duct. View this image ›
Netflix ID: 10380222 19. And actually getting to have giant knockers for all your trouble. View this image ›
CBS Unless your boobs were already big, which in that case…¯\_(ツ)_/¯
ID: 10380840
